en-US.name: History Pack
en-US.summary: The history pack is a great addition because you will hear facts about history.
en-US.description: The history pack expands the set of facts shared with you to include facts about history.

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: The history pack adds over 10 history facts into the set of facts randomly chosen to be shared with you.
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: Thanks for purchasing the history pack.  You now have access to history facts!

testingInstructions: <TESTING INSTRUCTIONS FOR THE CERTIFICATION TEAM SO THEY KNOW HOW TO PURCHASE AND USE THIS PRODUCT>
